title: What languages is Unity Certification available in?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am interested in becoming a Unity Certified Developer
  • I would like to know if Certification Courseware and Exams are available in my language

sections.title: Cause
content: Unity's website and Documentation is available in a variety of languages, but Certification is not as yet.

sections.title: Resolution
content: At this time, the Unity Certification Exam and Courseware are only available in English. Other languages are currently in development however and will be available soon.

sections.title: More Information
content: For more information and updates on Certification, please see the mini-site.
For more information on the costs of Certification, please see this article.
